item.title: LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories announced for Switch, PC
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • Switch

Includes English language support.

Dragami Games has announced LoveR Kiss: Endless Memories, a significantly enhanced version of the 2020-released romance simulation game LoveR Kiss. It will launch for Switch and PC via Steam on November 27 in Japan for 6,490 yen. It will support English, Japanese, and Traditional Chinese language options.

Here is an overview of the game, via Dragami Games:

The 2020-released romance simulation game LoveR Kiss Returns with a significant number of new features.

Alongside additional photo shooting spots and costumes, the user interface has been polished and the physics have improved, offering an overall largely improved gameplay experience.

Additionally, the new mode “PRO Photo Session” grants instant access to all of the features necessary for photo shooting, including subjects, photo shooting spots, costumes, poses, and lens filters, as well as place topping items in the background and add photo frames and stamps to photos.

Additionally, almost all previously released downloadable content is included. And in addition to Japanese, the game will also support English and Traditional Chinese language options.

The LoveR series will also make its platform debut on Steam, with optimizations such as improved graphics for the PC environment and mouse control support.
